name: Ice Track Trains
description:
Hello!

This is the game jam my team and I did prior to beginning our major production.

My contributions were the particle effects and the overall design of the game.

So the post mortem for this game jam is. . . well it's not overly enjoyable to be frank, gameplay wise. If I was to do it over again, would do a more grid based puzzle game type of thing. But that's what game jams are about right? testing ideas and see what works!
